name: Caves of Ludrum
description:
A simple platform game developed in about one month, while learning the basics of the Godot Engine. A large part of the assets used are available under the CC0 or CC-BY licences on the sites listed in the credit page of the game; I only adapted some of them to fit my needs and added the few missing ones (where possible). At the moment, the game only includes the first ten levels.

Help Olaf the Viking and Mika the Witch to find the treasures hidden in the Caves of Ludrum. Fight the denizens of the caves and use wisely the perks of the two characters to solve puzzles and open up new paths.

Controls: use the Arrow Keys to move and jump, the X key to change character and the Z key to attack

Requirements: the game should run smoothly on any browser with WebGL support.
